TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An individual who does not carry a mutation previously identified in his or her family.
In genetics, a person who does not have a mutated (changed) disease-causing gene that has been previously identified in his or her family.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Persona no portadora de una mutación identificada antes en su familia.
En el campo de la genética, una persona que no tiene un gen mutado (cambiado) causal de una enfermedad, que se identificó antes en su familia.
